    • Method Detail

      • getMembers

        public java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.Integer,Member> getMembers()
                                                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Getter function for retrieving the Members from the database.
        Returns:
        A TreeMap of Members, where the Key is the libTicketNumber and the Value is the Member.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getBooks

        public java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.String,Book> getBooks()
                                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Getter function for retrieving the Books from the database.
        Returns:
        A TreeMap of Books, where the Key is the ISBN and the Value is the Book.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getBorrowings

        public java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.Integer,Borrowing> getBorrowings()
                                                             throws java.lang.Exception

        Returns:

        java.lang.Exception
